data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the genus Carasobarbus Karaman, 1971 (Actinopterygii, Cyprinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Borkenhagen, Kai, Krupp, Friedhelm (2013): Taxonomic revision of the genus Carasobarbus Karaman, 1971 (Actinopterygii, Cyprinidae). ZooKeys 339: 1-53, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.339.4903, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.339.4903
